name: Ladybird Reflect
description: Ladybird Reflect is a Breakout game about a ladybird on a journey to find its lost children and it needs your help to get them back.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: 1,2 Ghz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 130 MB available space Sound Card: optional
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 1,5 Ghz or faster Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 130 MB available space Sound Card: onboard
